duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver quality care, diagnose health problems, and recommend further treatment options for Gastroenterology patients.
Coordinate inpatient endoscopic procedures, order and interpret tests, administer medications, and provide referrals to other practitioners as necessary.
Ensure patient records are kept up to date, consult with healthcare professionals when needed, and supervise infusions while in office.
Maintain an office-based practice, work as part of a Miriam Hospital UGI physician/NP team, and document notes in the Lifespan Epic system.
Round in the hospital, maintain office hours in a 2-week rotation, and work alongside physicians and nurses in both an office and hospital setting.

education_certification.credential: Rhode Island Licensure and Board Certification as a Nurse Practitioner
